Docs.summary: Enables hosting of ASP.NET pages outside the Internet Information Services (IIS) application. This class enables the host to create application domains for processing ASP.NET requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationHost> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).
